thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com | tyresonthedrive.com | 81 of 1961
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
Had four new tyres fitted at home. The fitter (Iain) called ten minutes before arrival which was within the times Quote: d. Upon arrival, Iain was very polite and started work promptly. During the fitting I took five minutes to quiz Iain about the company, tyres and a few other mechanical topics to which he responded both knowledgeably and courteously.
In all I had a first class experience and will not hesitate to use this company again.
